dmca.title: TV Broadcast DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
The following message has been automatically forwarded to your
address for consultation, based on the contents of the message.

Replies to this message will be returned to the Trakken system,
and not sent to the customer.  A customer service agent will review
the information you provide, and compose a response to the customer,
if necessary.

For more information on this ticket, click the link below:
http://trax/html/trax.html?ticket_id=947669540

Thanks for your help.

The text of the message follows, and the full message is attached.


Original Message Follows:
------------------------
From: brand.guard@nike.com
Subject: æ‚¨æäº¤ç»™ Google çš„è¯·æ±‚
Date: Tue, 17 Jan 2012 06:43:05 +0000



AutoDetectedBrowser: Internet Explorer 6
AutoDetectedOS: Windows XP
IIILanguage: zh-Hans
IssueType: lr_courtorder
Language: zh-Hans
companyname: Nike, Inc.
country_residence: CN
courtorder_explain: Dear Fang wenqing:

Nike Inc holds exclusive worldwide rights to the Nike family of products.   
These trademarks (and various works incidental thereto) are protected  
around the world under U.S. and international trademark and copyright law.

It has come to our attention that your website(s) listed below is selling  
or advertising materials that contain copies of our famous trademarks.   
This constitutes a formal request that you immediately provide proof that  
the goods bearing these trademarks are legitimate goods or remove the  
material at the following URLs:
http://www.shoes-nike.com
http://shoes-nike.com
http://www.shoes-nike.com/products/?nike-air-max87-s831_p1.html
http://www.shoes-nike.com/products/?air-jordan-11.0--s797_p1.html
http://www.shoes-nike.com/products/?nike-shox-R3--s851_p1.html

Further legal action may be pursued if this situation cannot be resolved.

Documentation showing origin of goods can be sent to:

Nike, Inc.
Herb Hedges, Footwear Brand Protection Manager
One Bowerman Drive
Beaverton, OR 97005
Phone: 1-503-671-2635
Fax: 1-503-532-4664
brand.guard@nike.com

Sincerely,

Herb Hedges
Nike, Inc.
Footwear Brand Protection Manager
One Bowerman Drive
Beaverton, OR 97005
Phone: 1-503-671-2635
Fax: 1-503-532-4664
brand.guard@nike.com
